thread.title: Stallings
thread.title_full: Therma Shield Solar Control reviewed by Stallings

author: Stallings
title: Stallings
text: I was so impressed with how organized they were, and the fact that they take all the garbage, etc. with them. Nothing left except their exceptional work. We were unable to use our kitchen due to the winter storm which took down many of our pine trees. Now, we are able to enjoy our kitchen again!
